QuestData.Title: The Glory of the Hunt
QuestData.Description:
You here for the festival, friend?
We're still settin' up here, but the hunt should've started by now!
If ya want to take part, go meet Abbey in Foxhollow Woods. She'll get you all set up.
Happy huntin'!
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Abbey Watkins at the edge of Foxhollow Woods.
